title: Engineering Mechanics: Engineering Thinking Competency Development Through Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of physics and calculus
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment integrating experimental analysis, theoretical learning, and design application using students' personal devices.

learning_goals: Explain core engineering mechanics theories (statics, dynamics, materials mechanics) by connecting them to real experimental data
Solve complex engineering problems using online adaptive tutorials and offline retro tutorials
Analyze real-world engineering design challenges and propose optimal solutions through a 6-week project-based assessment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
